attributes.action: With Draw TV Licensing for the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why do we still pay the BBC for watching TV ?

Can't the BBC raise funds like any other company in the big wide world ?

Why should we the British Public keep paying the bills and being forced into buying a TV licence each year... its not as though we have a choice other than not watching a TV. Is that a fair choice ? I think not.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
